# fibonacci-4n

a(n) = Fibonacci(4*n)/3

https://oeis.org/A004187 - a(n) = 7*a(n-1) - a(n-2) with a(0) = 0, a(1) = 1\
https://oeis.org/A004187/b004187.txt \
Values for odd indexes of [A001906](https://oeis.org/A001906) divided by 3.

# Configuration
Adjust PRECISION_BITS value for high n values (n > 11500)

# Usage

./a004187 50\
raw = [93523724330836713345870644137679559063175.00000...00000 +/- 3.81e-10494]\
a(50) = 93523724330836713345870644137679559063175

./a004187 100\
raw = [58674560215004655489408981797470416923461461101497397295575330965525115014738673225.00000...00000 +/- 4.43e-10452]\
a(100) = 58674560215004655489408981797470416923461461101497397295575330965525115014738673225

 ./a004187 1000\
raw = [.00000...00000 +/- 9.47e-9699]\
a(1000) =
